pages.title: Kamen Rider Mars
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim: Great Soccer Battle! Golden Fruits Cup! (2014, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver#sengoku_driver_mars)Sengoku Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Sengoku Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Regeneration II$(li)Haste$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength III
